mapper.select:
select wpr.id, wpr.code, wpr.name, wpr.total_price, wpr.put_user, wpr.remark, wpr.create_date, wpr.del_flag from warehouse_put_record wpr where 1 = 1
AND wor.code like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.code},"%")
AND wor.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.name},"%")
AND wor.put_user like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.putUser},"%")
order by wpr.create_date desc
